code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{fetchApod}from'../api/apod';import MarsExplorer from'../components/MarsExplorer';import NeoDashboard from'../components/NeoDashboard';import NasaImageSearch from'../components/NasaImageSearch';import AskTheCosmos from'../components/AskTheCosmos';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=_ref=>{let{activeSection}=_ref;const[apod,setApod]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetchApod().then(setApod);console.log(apod);},[]);if(!apod)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",style:{background:'#353935'},children:[activeSection==='apod'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container bg-dark p-4 rounded mb-7",id:"apod",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"display-5 fw-bold text-primary mb-4",children:"\uD83D\uDCF8 Astronomy Picture of the Day"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"h4 text-info mb-3",children:apod.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:apod.url,alt:"APOD",className:"img-fluid rounded shadow mb-3",style:{maxHeight:'600px',maxWidth:'100%',objectFit:'cover'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"lead text-light text-justify",style:{lineHeight:'1.8',textAlign:'justify'},children:apod.explanation})]}),activeSection==='mars'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MarsExplorer,{}),activeSection==='neo'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NeoDashboard,{}),activeSection==='search'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NasaImageSearch,{}),activeSection==='ai'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AskTheCosmos,{})]});};export default Home;
